fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: BVA follows the foreign policy of the EU, especially in regards to human rights and minority rights in the EU's relations with the South Asian Countries. BVA also follows the EU development and humanitarian agenda, including the trade agreements.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: Nouveaux Droits de l'Homme -- NDH (ECOSOC uno) ,
